title: Understanding the Role of Data Literacy
text: Consider why accurate data interpretation is essential when sharing information with others.

title: Implications of Data Literacy
text: Think about what happens if you misunderstand the data you are presenting.

hintAnswer: You need to understand data in order to present it effectively.
title: Presenting Data Accurately
text: When presenting data, is it more about knowing the statistics, becoming a data scientist, or understanding and communicating data accurately?
choices: You need to understand data in order to present it effectively.
Without data literacy, you can't be a data scientist.
You need to know statistics to work with data.
You need to be fluent in data in order to present it accurately.
